content.subHeader1: Welcome home. We’re excited to see you again.
content.text1: In this current season, we are offering weekend worship experiences online and gatherings for in-person weekend services on Sundays. In light of public health guidelines intended to limit the spread of COVID-19 in our community, we have made a number of changes to our in-person experiences, including limiting capacity and requiring online registration. Our livestream service will continue, and everyone is encouraged to choose the worship experience that is right for them.
content.text2: We invite you to read the details below and join us in caring for one another as best we can. There will be an option to register for in-person gatherings at the end of this page as well as a link to the livestream should you prefer that option.

graphicItems.title: Please Register
graphicItems.description: Registration is required to ensure a safe gathering environment.

graphicItems.title: Mind the numbers
graphicItems.description: Capacity limits mean we will only be able to allow a set number of kids, youth, and adults.

graphicItems.title: Health check
graphicItems.description: To ensure everyone’s safety, you’ll need to confirm your wellness prior to entry.

graphicItems.title: Wear a mask
graphicItems.description: A mask is required throughout the service. If you do not have one, one will be provided.

graphicItems.title: Lovingly apart
graphicItems.description: We are still required to stay six feet apart from people who are not in our household.

graphicItems.title: No singing
graphicItems.description: Public health has asked that no one sings along to the music.

content.text3: Anyone attending a Sunday gathering will be required to pre-register online. We do this to ensure we aren’t exceeding the number of people that can safely attend. The online registrations window will be open each week from 5pm on Sunday to 5pm on Thursday.
content.text4: During the registration process we will ask for contact information in case we need to contact you due to a COVID related issue. When you arrive on a Sunday morning you’ll proceed to the check in area where a friendly volunteer will check you in and confirm your health screening.
